body: can you post a full bug report as described here? https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md

### expected behaviour
update to 6.0.0

### actual behaviour
did not update to 6.0.0, stuck in maintenance mode

### steps to reproduce
1. deleted all folders except settings and config
2. extracted new package
3. went to index.htm

### server configuration
operating system: debian wheezy

web server: nginx

database: postgresql 9.1+134wheezy4

php version: 5.4.4-14+deb7u5

owncloud version: (see owncloud admin page)
5.0.22

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install:

list of activated app:
?

the content of config/config.php: (without the database password and passwordsalt)
```
<?php
$config = array (
  'instanceid' => 'xxx',
  'passwordsalt' => 'xxx',
  'datadirectory' => '/data/owncloud',
  'dbtype' => 'pgsql',
  'version' => '5.0.22',
  'dbname' => 'owncloud',
  'dbhost' => 'localhost',
  'dbtableprefix' => 'oc_',
  'dbuser' => 'owncloud',
  'dbpassword' => 'xxx',
  'installed' => true,
  'loglevel' => '0',
  'maxzipinputsize' => 2147483648,
  'allowzipdownload' => true,
  'maintenance' => false,
  'forcessl' => true,
  'theme' => '',
);
```
### client configuration
browser: yes

operating system: yes

### logs
#### web server error log
